card.title: Welcome to the Telegram Datacenter Monitoring Service
card.body:
This service provides real-time monitoring of Telegram's datacenter availability based on three aspects: - Network: performing ping tests to Telegram datacenter IPs. - Media: attempting to download media files from Telegram datacenters. - Web: performing ping tests to official Telegram websites.
By using this service, you agree to the following terms and acknowledge the inherent limitations of the provided data.

card.title: No Guarantee of Accuracy or Availability
card.body:
This service is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. The results displayed are based on network conditions, system load, and other external factors that may vary. The service does not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the information provided.
Before sharing any reports or alerts derived from this monitoring tool, users are strongly encouraged to verify their own network conditions, test alternative access methods, and check for official Telegram announcements to ensure the accuracy of their conclusions.

card.title: External Factors and User Dependency
card.body: The results of network tests (ping, download speed, media availability) depend on various external factors, including but not limited to: - The user's internet connection speed and stability. - The geographical location of the user. - Temporary network issues affecting routing to Telegramâs infrastructure. - Restrictions imposed by ISPs or network firewalls. - Changes in Telegrams infrastructure beyond our control.

card.title: Liability Disclaimer
card.body: Users acknowledge that the results may not reflect actual Telegram service availability and should not be used as a definitive source of information.
